title: Goat's cheese tart
ingredients: ['1 pinch salt', '240g plain flour', '180g unsalted butter', '3 tablespoons cold water', '6 large eggs', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh flat leaf parsley', "400g goat's cheese, crumbled (see tip)", 'ground black pepper, to taste']
